npcs.name: Aeris Lightwind
utterances: Look around? Freshest catch on the docks.

npcs.name: Alexander Kerr
utterances: You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here try on one of these.
I have some nice new suits of chain that have stood up very well.  Would you like to see them?
Well, that suit is looking a might worn.  Can I interest you in a new suit of fine armor?

npcs.name: Aliindar
utterances: Welcome, friend! The wares of an entire city are at your fingertips. So please make your selection.
Greetings and salutations, my fair patron.  So, what is it within the confines of majestic Qeynos that I may provide for you?

npcs.name: Alissa Cleeway
utterances: Browse the docks all you want, I guarantee you won't find better fish than mine.

npcs.name: Ashilda MacHinry
utterances: I fear no man or beast.

npcs.name: Birney Abbot
utterances: What can I get for ya?

npcs.name: Borden Mannus
utterances: Listen here,  this ain't no public brew hall! The Mermaid's Lure is for Marauders only.

npcs.name: Boulden Smitestone
utterances: We can't take any chances that the Rallosian Empire will rebuild itself.  Who will heed my call!?
I'm sorry, but you look a bit green for something as momentous as this.  Come and talk to me after you've sunk your teeth into some real adventure.
Now is the time we must band together and find what's left of the Feerrott!

npcs.name: Carpenter Paddock
utterances: We're running low on wood, but I don't want to mention it to Overseer Scarbourough until he calms down.
I'm very busy! I must get more wood!
I'm very busy! Sorry, I've no time to talk!

npcs.name: Dajor Botswein
utterances: Don't let the pretty waves fool you; life at sea is no holiday, what with serpents, sirens and pirates.
She's beautiful, isn't she?  And deadly.

npcs.name: Erwin Rohand
utterances: She's still out there, I can feel it.  When I have enough money, I am heading out to sea to find my one true love. Won't you help me, friend? Just a small purchase?

npcs.name: Gael Pinewhisper
utterances: Welcome! What can I help you with?

npcs.name: Grisvane Stonearm
utterances: Hello there.  I'll take care of your coin and goods if they need safekeeping.

npcs.name: Harbormaster Crestbreak
utterances: Go on, take a look at the stock.  You'll never beat this price in the city.  I guarantee it!
Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!

npcs.name: Harron Griswald
utterances: If you're looking for the bar, it's upstairs. Be careful of the Coldwind Marauders ... they really enjoy their drink.

npcs.name: Heather Atherton
utterances: Welcome to my humble shop.  We have quite a selection of weapons to choose from.  See for yourself...
Is there something you need to have custom made?  I can see if I can get one of my lads to look into it!
Never go into battle without a tried and trusted weapon. Take a look at what we have in stock.

npcs.name: Ian Cathlan
utterances: I'm sorry. I don't know who ye are.  If ye'd be so kind as ta leave me to my business, I'd appreciate it.  Good day ta ye.

npcs.name: Innkeeper Galsway
utterances: What is it you need, traveler? If it's reasonable rates, fine food and ale you desire, you've come to the right inn.

npcs.name: Jarek O'Kelly
utterances: I just got a shipment in from the Far Sea's Trading Company.  I don't just show anybody this stuff so, shhhh!
Never go into battle without a tried and trusted weapon. Take a look at what we have in stock.
Is there something you need to have custom made?  I can see if I can get one of my lads to look into it!

npcs.name: Keigwyn Macinshire
utterances: You talk to strangers?  What's the purpose of that?

npcs.name: Kizmit
utterances: Welcome to the bank, citizen. How can I assist you?

npcs.name: Madam Istynia
utterances: Blast it! Who keeps taking all of the parchment?
Ah, a student of the arcane.  Is there something I can help you find?

npcs.name: Marius Ironflint
utterances: Good day to you citizen.  If you've got any of that armor from ol' Ian here, I'd be happy to offer ya some of the newer stuff.

npcs.name: Mary Dillon
utterances: Just leave me alone. Please!
What?

npcs.name: Minda Broadfeet
utterances: I have some nice new suits of chain that have stood up very well.  Would you like to see them?
You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here try on one of these.

npcs.name: Nelis Greenpocket
utterances: Welcome! What can I help you with?

npcs.name: Phen Domlinson
utterances: Fresh supplies every week! Step up and see for yourself.

npcs.name: Portis Bonham
utterances: Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!

npcs.name: Praxum
utterances: Hello there, my fine adventurer.  Just give me that armor right quick and I'll hammer it up good as new!
Greetings there, have something that you think needs a bit of repair?

npcs.name: Rabbleson
utterances: Greetings, friend traveler! We have the finest supplies to fill your adventuring needs.
Go on, take a look at the stock.  You'll never beat this price in the city.  I guarantee it!

npcs.name: Renee Atherton
utterances: You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here try on one of these.

npcs.name: Robert Newbury
utterances: I'll take care of your coin and goods if they need safekeeping.

npcs.name: Royal Accountant Fowler
utterances: Hello, fellow citizen. I'm the Royal Accountant for the city of Qeynos.  When you wish to form a guild within the city, you simply need to bring six members here and pay a nominal fee.

npcs.name: Sean Wellfayer
utterances: Please, try your luck. I've been fishing here since I was a small boy, and I still have great luck hooking fish.
If fishing doesn't interest you, perhaps bait does!

npcs.name: Shanda Tierbold
utterances: Stop right there! No one goes through this door without explicit permission.

npcs.name: Sheldon Lamport
utterances: All right where is my pen?  How am I supposed to scribe anything without my pen?
Blast it! Who keeps taking all of the parchment?

npcs.name: Sir Aidan Godard
utterances: Before you stands the Hall of Steel.  Within these walls is the birthplace of the Steel Warriors, the greatest fighters in all of Norrath.

npcs.name: Smith Holgren
utterances: Never go into battle without a tried and trusted weapon. Take a look at what we have in stock.

npcs.name: Squire Moorford
utterances: Hello!  How can I help you? It's my proud duty to help keep this harbor safe!

npcs.name: Tabatha Cantra
utterances: Greetings Citizen.  Are you in need of my transcription services?

npcs.name: Tala McMorgan
utterances: You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here try on one of these.

npcs.name: Thomas Bodley
utterances: Coin is no object when gaining protection from your enemies.  What price can be put on your safety?
Well, that suit is looking a might worn.  Can I interest you in a new suit of fine armor?
I have some nice new suits of chain that have stood up very well.  Would you like to see them?

npcs.name: Umli Grayfist
utterances: Have I got a bargain for you!  Come now, step up, I don't bite.  Check my goods and see if we can't make a whale of a deal! Ha ha ha ha ...Whale of a deal, get it?

npcs.name: Vernon Tinworthy
utterances: What do you want?

npcs.name: Zara
utterances: Ah, a student of the arcane.  Is there something I can help you find?
Blast it! Who keeps taking all of the parchment?
All right where is my pen?  How am I supposed to scribe anything without my pen?
